Subject: Re: Please, Don't Die!

::Prowl::

Almost as throught a haze, Prowl could feel Iron Raptor stroking his face. He 
heard her voice, but couldn't make out the words, feeling himself slip slowly 
away. He could feel her face near his, straining to keep his optics activated.

Everything was fading... Prowl's life was flowing away, his spark about to 
join the Matrix, when....

Her lips touched his, a new energy surging through him. He couldn't die now! 
Not now, not in this room, not from just another Alliance battle. If this 
kiss was the only reason to live, it was more than good enough for him.

Prowl takes in a sharp breath, his lips still locked with Iron Raptor, as his 
spark releases its repair coils, slithering across his chest to work on the 
worst of the damage. Prowl was fully aware now, aware of Iron Raptor's lips 
on his, of almost every circuit in his body screaming at him with pain. But 
at least he was no longer dying. Prowl was breathing once again, and his arm 
found its way around Iron Raptor, deepening their kiss.

Closing his optics in pain from moving his arm, Prowl leans his head back, 
opening his optics to look at his one true love.

"I love you," he whispers, and then goes unconscious, his repair systems 
taking over. His arm goes limp again, and he relaxes in her arms, but his 
life signs were stronger than ever...
